dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2289 : To rename section 219(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 as the Kay Bailey Hutchison Spousal IRA.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To rename section 219(c) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 as the Kay Bailey Hutchison Spousal IRA.

section.text: The heading of subsection (c) of section 219 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking Special rules for certain married individuals and inserting Kay Bailey Hutchison Spousal IRA.

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives June 25, 2013.
